

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total  from (reviews r left join reviews_description rd on r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id left join products_description pd on r.products_id = pd.products_id and pd.language_id ='2' left join products p on p.products_id= r.products_id)  where r.products_id = p.products_id ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select r.*, rd.*, pd.*, p.* from (reviews r left join reviews_description rd on r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id left join products_description pd on r.products_id = pd.products_id and pd.language_id ='2' left join products p on p.products_id= r.products_id)  where r.products_id = p.products_id  order by pd.products_name limit 0, 20;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '4'
                             and language_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '4'
                             and language_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select r.reviews_read, r.customers_name,
                                             length(rd.reviews_text) as reviews_text_size
                                      from reviews r, reviews_description rd
                                      where r.reviews_id = '1'
                                      and r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_image
                                        from products
                                        where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                                       from products_description
                                       where products_id = '1'
                                       and language_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select (avg(reviews_rating) / 5 * 100) as average_rating
                                         from reviews
                                         where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '1'
                             and language_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, master_categories_id from products where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * from project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database' ORDER BY project_version_date_applied DESC LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'lejcuq7vlrrbv9np2u87r7vb14';
